forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. West southwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the day reveals a gentle embrace of mostly sunny skies, hinting at a high hovering around a comfortable 69 degrees. While the sun graces the city, wispy clouds linger, telling tales of the marine layer that caresses the edges of the Golden Gate and hides just beneath the Twin Peaks. The west-southwest breeze, low and playful, sways through the streets, adding a soft rustling to the air, though occasional gusts remind us of the vibrant energy that San Francisco holds.

Tonight, a shift towards a more muted ambiance brings about a blanket of clouds, gently nudging the temperature down to a cozy 60 degrees. In this transition, you'll want to opt for layers; a light sweater or a breathable jacket will serve you well as you wander through the evening, perhaps stopping by a quaint café for a warm drink or meandering through the lively streets, savoring the mildness of early fall. With the waning afternoon sun accompanying your journey, it’s an ideal time to explore the lesser-known corners of the city, indulging in its spirited charm, all while delighting in the crispness of coastal air that lingers as the day unwinds.
